dicom_to_cnn.tools.rt_processor.DVH_data.convert_str_list_to_float_list(str_liste: list) → list¶

function to convert a list with str to a list with float

Args:

str_liste ([list]): [list with string]

Returns:

[list]: [return the same list, but with float]

dicom_to_cnn.tools.rt_processor.DVH_data.generate_plot(dictionnary, mode='cumulative', dose_mode='Gray', volume_mode='%')¶

function to generate graph of DVH data, in cumulative or differential mode

Args:

dictionnary ([dict]): [dict generated by Instance_RTDose.wrap_DHVSequence_in_dict() from Instance_RTDose class] mode (str, optional): [‘cumulative’ or ‘differentiel’ only]. Defaults to ‘cumulative’. dose_mode (str, optional): [‘%’ or ‘Gray’ only ]. Defaults to ‘Gray’. volume_mode (str, optional): [‘%’ or ‘cc’ only ]. Defaults to ‘%’.

Returns:

[type]: [description]

dicom_to_cnn.tools.rt_processor.DVH_data.generate_x_y_cumul(liste: list) → list¶

generate list of x and y coordonates (DVH) from DVHData cumulative list (from DHVSequence in RTDOSE file)

Args:

liste (list): [ [x,y,x,y,x,y,…] ]

Returns:

[list]: [return a list for x coordonates and a list for corresponding y coordonates]
